Service Details: - Provide a setting where persons of fifty years of age and over are able to use their talents, experience, energies and creative abilities and to organize and operate recreational, cultural and educational activities that are of interest and benefit to the members, and that support a need in the community- Programs and activities include exercise and dance programs, crafts, games, yoga, the Peachland Variety Singers choir, AA and TOPS meetings
